name: High Fiber Bread
author: blazing belilah
summary: This dense, chewy bread has a good dose of fiber and is great toasted in the morning with my oatmeal.
directions: Place water, molasses, yeast, wheat flour, ground flax seed, bread flour, oat bran, rolled oats, amaranth seeds, and salt in the pan of a bread machine in the order recommended by manufacturer
Select dough cycle; press start and allow machine to run complete dough cycle
Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface
Form dough into 2 loaves and place on baking stone
Cover loaves with a damp cloth and let rise until doubled in volume, about 1 hour
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Bake in preheated oven until top is golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes
Slide loaf onto a work surface and gently tap bottom of loaf
If it sounds hollow, bread is done
